2083

Ex-football

Description: A series of works that takes familiar discarded objects - in this case a football, and represents them, within a box frame.

There is a forensic quality to the way that the object is presented that suggests a form of classification or evidence.

80cm x 60cm x 5cm _ £480

brendan@twozeroeightthree.com

  • Tire fragments
  • A piece of chalk
  • Tops
  • Packing tape cones
  • Ex-football
  • Found objects
  • Posidonias
  • 72 rolls _ 32 balls
